Plot: After a teenager has a terrifying vision of him and his friends dying in a plane crash, he prevents the accident only to have Death hunt them down, one by one.
Title: Final Destination
Writer: Glen Morgan (screenplay), James Wong (screenplay), Jeffrey Reddick (screenplay), Jeffrey Reddick (story)
Actors: Devon Sawa, Ali Larter, Kerr Smith, Kristen Cloke
tomatoConsensus: Despite a panel of X-Files' alums at the helm and a promising premise, flighty performances and poor execution keep Final Destination from ever taking off.
